lead_paragraph: The Carolina Hurricanes star Eric Staal and his brother, Jordan Staal of the Pittsburgh Penguins, were arrested and charged for misdemeanor disorderly conduct and obstructing the legal process charges at Eric Staal’s bachelor party. The Cook County (Minn.) Sheriff’s Office said the brothers were among 14 arrested last weekend after authorities received several complaints about “screaming, yelling and playing loud music” at the resort in northeastern Minnesota.
